response.overview: Judas is the hero and Jesus is the villain in this lewd retelling of the classic Bible story. Depicted through anthropomorphic animals, we see a unique alternative perspective. Judas (an unscrupulous black goat) has been at odds with Jesus (a self-crucifying white sheep) ever since childhood. However, when an opportunity arises to sell Jesus out for the 30 Euros he needs to get into a sex show, things finally seem to start going Judas' way. But what will Jesus' adoring fans have to say about it?
response.tagline: A biblical rivaly unilke you've ever seen before!
response.title: Judas & Jesus

release_dates.note: Shown at the 2009 Annecy International Short Film Festival
